EmailTemplate.description: US-0018762: [AU] Contract Reminder Email notification to all AU Coupon Sellers
EmailTemplate.name: CouponSeller_Contract_Reminder_AU
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_ID__c} is due to Expire by {!Coupon__c.Contract_Due_Date__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Coupon_Seller__c.Seller__c},
This is a quick reminder to let you know that the contract for {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_ID__c} promotion will expire on the {!Coupon_Seller__c.Coupon_Contract_Due_Date__c}.
To ensure that you donâ€™t lose out on the opportunity to participate in the above promotion, we encourage you to sign the contract as soon as possible.
Thank You Retail Promotions Team eBay Australia
